title: adidas Men's Sportswear Basic 3-stripes Tricot Track Suit
description: Men's track suit for iconic style
REGULAR FIT: Not tight and not loose, the perfect in-between fit
TIMELESS SPORT STYLE: Full zip with stand-up collar for a classic track jacket look
EASY STORAGE: Side pockets hold small items
MADE WITH RECYCLED MATERIALS: Made with 100% recycled materials, this product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste

Nothing says effortlessly put together like a track suit. This men's set is perfect for showing off your style in ease, whether you're meeting up with friends or going for a stroll. A drawcord waist lets you customize the fit to match your style and comfort needs. Signature 3-Stripes show off your adidas pride.
